description: Lyla Storm, Casey Calvert and James Deen return for a very special feature presentation with AMAZING rough sex and interaction. Casey Calvert is a war reporter who lives out her fantasy when she goes deep into forbidden enemy territory looking for a hot story. She takes photographs of what looks like a POW girl, Lyla Storm, who is naked and being fucked hard and dominated by some of the rebel soldiers. Casey then tries to leave and gets caught by a soldier who ties her up, interrogates her and fucks her into oblivion. Both girls are then tied up together and get the fuck of a lifetime. This is one story this bad journalist will not be writing about!
title: Operation Desert Anal: A Feature Presentation: Two Beautiful Girls Brutally Fucked in the Desert
